STATE OF MICHIGAN
DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES
BUREAU OF CHILDREN A ND ADULT LICENSING
JENNIFER M. GRANHOLM ISMAEL AHMED
GOVERNOR DIRECTOR
July 20, 2010
Suzanne Lewis, Administrator
Catholic Charities of Jackson, Lenawee & Hillsdale
199 N. Broad St.
Adrian, MI 49221
Re: Application #: CB460308844
Catholic Charities of Jackson, Lenawee & Hillsdale
199 N. Broad St.
Adrian, MI 49221
Dear Ms. Lewis:
Attached is the Original Licensing Study Report for the above referenced facility. The
study has determined substantial compliance with applicable licensing statutes and
administrative rules. Therefore, a provisional license has been issued. The effective
dates of your license are 7/20/2010 through 1/19/2011. You should receive your new
license within a few weeks. Check it for accuracy.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact the local office if
you have any questions. The local office can be reached at (248) 975-5953.
Sincerely,
Stephen J. Garcia, Licensing Consultant
Bureau of Children and Adult Licensing
22 Center St., Ypsilanti, MI 48198
P.O. BOX 30650 • LANSING, MICHIGAN 48909-8150
www.michigan.gov • (517) 335-6124

MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES
BUREAU OF CHILDREN AND ADULT LICENSING
LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION

Adrian, MI 49221

Hillsdale

Adrian, MI 49221
Facility Telephone #: (517) 263-2191
06/09/2010
Application Date:
Capacity: N/A
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, PRIVATE
1

II. METHODOLOGY
06/09/2010 Enrollment
III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS & CONCLUSIONS
A. Physical Description of Facility
Catholic Charities of Lenawee has a main office located at 199 Broad St., Adrian, MI,
49221.The organization is proposing to merge with Catholic Charities of Jackson
County. With the merger, planned for July 1, 2010, the name of the organization will be
changed to read Catholic Charities of Jackson, Lenawee and Hillsdale Counties. On
that date the licensed site and main office for foster care and adoptions will remain at
199 Broad St., Adrian, MI. The Hillsdale and Jackson offices will be satellite offices for
these services.
Also, with the merger the agency’s license number changed and the agency’s tax ID
number has been changed to (38-1818593).
B. Program Description
Catholic Charities of Lenawee is currently licensed to place children for adoption,
evaluate applicants for adoption, certify homes for license and to place children in foster
homes.
C. Rule/Statutory Violations
During the last licensing study the agency was found to be in substantial compliance
with applicable licensing rules and statutes.
IV. RECOMMENDATION
I recommend issuance of a provisional license to Catholic Charities of Jackson,
Lenawee and Hillsdale Counties..
July 2010
________________________________________
Stephen Garcia Date
Licensing Consultant
Approved By:
July 20, 2010
________________________________________
Linda Lee Date
Area Manager
